General.Name: HeiLongJiang Kingland Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Kingland Technology Co.,Ltd. provides solutions for the ecological environment in China. It operates through Ecological Water Saving Operation Service Business; Garden Environment Technology Service Business; Soil Remediation Operation Services Business; and Others segments. The company is involved in provision of environmental remediation and restoration engineering services; solid waste environmental pollution control and operation; river basin and farmland soil environment comprehensive treatment; mine ecological environment management; desertification control; and other environmental restoration business. It also engages in water ecological restoration, irrigation area water-saving integrated system engineering, sewage treatment, riverside ecological landscape engineering, smart water affairs, etc; and garden engineering construction and landscape design, as well as provides landscape design, engineering construction, and nursery stock maintenance management services for various municipal, real estate landscape, leisure and vacation, ecological wetland, and other garden projects. In addition, the company develops and sells network equipment, computer software and hardware, communication products, electronic products, and digital products. The company was formerly known as Heilongjiang Kingland Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kingland Technology Co.,Ltd. in July 2016. Kingland Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
